en-US: The new MCSkinn inherits the classic (v.1.2.8) version, but we refactored the whole codebase, bringing more features, abundant models, and better performance. We're still working on this app, and we're excited to share it with you soon.
zh-CN: 新版 MCSkinn 继承了经典 (v.1.2.8) 版本，但我们重构了整个程序，带来了更多功能、丰富的模型和更好的性能。我们仍在努力开发这个应用，很快就会和大家见面。
